divs: sighting detailsfirst time i was driving a navy buddy home, second time was with my mom. bothwere identical.it flew over the house, low and silently. 500ft or so high, wideas k-mart. triangular with many white lights. no real colors. it flew on atypical flight path of the local f\a-18s from lemoore nas, but when it turnedwithout changing the direction it was facing. air traffic from nas had notraffic reported. flew over them and beyond. never above 500 to 1000 ft. silent stealth??? im trained by the army to identify aircraft, this wasntanything ive ever seen.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Lemoore
There were no other sightings in Lemoore on or around June 22nd 2000
Summary: K-Mart sized silent triangle ship flew over our ho
